title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terrorist Targets in Lebanon: A Detailed Account of Military Actions”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military buildings where terrorists were located, alongside an observation post and terrorist infrastructure: The IDF attacked terrorist targets in Lebanon.

Combat aircraft of the Air Force attacked a terrorist infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Zeqin area, alongside a military building of the organization in the Yarun area and another military building in the area of Ayta Al-Shaab, where terrorists were located.

Earlier today, IDF forces attacked an observation post of the organization in the Shebaa area. In addition, last night (Thursday) a military site of the organization in the Kfar Hamam area was attacked.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3vEfJhc
